text:
RT @Lyncherator This was one of my favorite excerpts from @CoryBooker's moving conversation with his mom for #MothersDay 

Here's to being the best we can be for our ancestors 

Listen to the podcast here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/lift-every-voice/id1334991206?mt=2 #LiftEveryVoice http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdGPlVQWkAEfPv5.jpg

She and my father met while they were active in the civil rights movement. My sister Maya and I actually joke that we grew up surrounded by a bunch of adults marching and shouting for this thing called justice. We were raised on stories of the upheaval and activism of the 1960s.
@lilmizzcbw Thank you!
@andlav Thank you!

RT @mic It's a holiday for all mothers — even those who can't afford bail.

https://mic.com/articles/189363/this-mothers-day-volunteers-are-paying-to-get-moms-out-of-jail-with-the-blackmamabailout-campaign#.Ru54wWfh5
Deseándoles un Feliz Día de las Madres a todas las mamas hoy, en especial a mi madre, Oria, y a mi esposa, Jeanette.

Wishing my beautiful wife, Jeanette, a very Happy Mother’s Day. I could not be where I am today without your love, encouragement and support. I’m so grateful for all you do for our family! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdFWgKIWkAAPLBX.jpg
To all of the moms in the world: we love you, thank you, and #HappyMothersDay! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdFu0dsXcAEc8ud.jpg
My mother became a pioneering breast cancer researcher. She maintained her lab at Lawrence Berkeley until the day she died; she knew that the search for truth was a lifelong effort.

Too many American mothers share tragic stories like Ebony’s within our country’s bail system. It’s critical we come together to reform a system that is wasteful, discriminatory and doesn’t keep our communities safe. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdGL8mFWkAA3mVa.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/995704756705226753/vid/320x180/0C4o_WAJrfESrzda.mp4?tag=2

To my hero since Day 1 – Happy #MothersDay! 

I spoke to my mom on the phone & we had a deeply moving conversation that I wanted to share with you all on #LiftEveryVoice.

30,000 Toys "R" Us workers across the country are losing their jobs. This is what happens when you have a system that allows private equity firms to destroy profitable businesses and throw workers out on the streets with no severance. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dc8bzHyWAAASs9p.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/995043300737470465/vid/240x240/9FD93VCgoPD4w30y.mp4?tag=2
Driving in Jersey today I saw something I never saw before: A Vegan Vehicle.  #Vegan #VeganCar http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdHJ9bSV4AAZId7.jpg

RT @Heritage .@sentedcruz delivered a powerful speech here this week. Watch now: https://www.heritage.org/global-politics/event/nicaragua-inflection-point http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdFJ5HeX0AEZhsX.jpg

Remember when several groups & the @NYT attacked me for pointing out the potential role of school discipline policy in #Parkland tragedy? But now evidence grows by the day that the shooter should have been dealt with long before that horrible day. #Sayfie  http://www.sun-sentinel.com/local/broward/parkland/florida-school-shooting/fl-florida-school-shooting-discipline-20180510-story.html
@TheDonDrew Yes and it was awesome.

America’s maternal mortality rate is the highest in the developed world, while black mother are three to four times more likely to die from pregnancy-related complications than white mothers. We must reverse this trend. https://www.usatoday.com/story/opinion/2018/05/10/maternal-deaths-mothers-mortality-column/595818002/

Thank you! https://twitter.com/njnfarj/status/995694585488859137 QT @njnfarj Thank you @CoryBooker ! Beautiful and moving. Check out this cool episode: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/lift-every-voice/id1334991206?mt=2&i=411282736 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdFq8sAWkAEg6V6.jpg

Like many of you, I’m spending today thinking about my mother. She was all of 5 feet, but she could move mountains, as she proved when she crossed an ocean at age 19 to study here. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdFyJbpXkAAth5y.jpg
Wishing a happy Mother's Day to all mothers today, especially my mom, Oria, and my wife, Jeanette. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdFK2lkW4AES5z_.png
There’s a photo I cherish of her and one of her best friends in life, my Auntie Lenore, standing in front of a sign that says, “Protest Birmingham atrocities. Write the president.”

Congratulations to the @TxStateBobcats’ @TXStateSoftball team in defeating the Louisiana Ragin’ Cajuns and winning the 2018 Sunbelt Conference Championship! —> https://txstatebobcats.com/news/2018/5/12/softball-win-2018-sun-belt-conference-championship.aspx
RT @SenGillibrand It has been 96 days since the House unanimously passed a bill to address sexual harassment in Congress. The Senate still hasn’t taken action.
Happy Mother’s Day to all hard-working, relentless mothers everywhere. We hope you all have a wonderful day.✊💪💁‍♀️
@RandySF45 Thank you!

America is the only industrialized country that doesn’t have a national paid family leave policy. This Mother’s day, let’s show American mothers that we truly care by committing to fix it. https://slate.com/human-interest/2018/05/mothers-day-lets-get-moms-something-they-could-really-use.html

“Many are the women of proven worth,but you have excelled them all. Charm is deceptive and beauty fleeting; the woman who fears the LORD is to be praised. Acclaim her for the work of her hands, and let her deeds praise her at the city gates.”  Proverbs 31:29-31 #MothersDay
Happy Mother's Day to Jane and all the mothers of this country. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DdGF2KWW0AEfVrF.jpg

From her, I learned to ask questions, gather evidence, and test hypotheses. I learned that no idea is too precious to be rigorously examined. I learned how to fight for justice and live a life of conscience, and I think of her every day.

No, but I can tell you where to get an awesome vegan cheese steak. Try @HipCityVeg - it is amazing.
